title: How long does it take to write a 30-minute script? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can't put a time limit on how long it takes to write anything. From a one line poem to a thousand page volume, it takes as much time as it takes. What works for me may or may not work for you. For example, while I can assure you that I can write a 30 minutes screenplay in as little as five hours, will that work for you? And how about the quality. It has been proven time and again that work done in patience usually has more quality than the one completed in a haste. Some people need a lot of time to brainstorm and unlucky their creative side. Others seam to do it in a fling. Your schedule is also an important factor. How much time can you spare to write in a day? The genre of your screenplay is also important. It takes a longer time to write adventure and action movies than romance and drama. I think taking these to mind would help. Also you can see this post Lyons, Lee. "How to Write a Trailer Script." , How to Write a Trailer Script. Accessed 03 July 2020.
